Package uno.anahata.asi.swing.chat.render

package uno.anahata.asi.swing.chat.render

  • Class
    Description
    AbstractMessagePanel<T extends AbstractMessage>
    A base class for rendering AbstractMessage instances in a collapsible, diff-based UI component.
    AbstractPartPanel<T extends AbstractPart>
    The abstract base class for rendering AbstractPart instances in a diff-based UI component.
    AbstractTextSegmentRenderer
    Abstract base class for rendering individual text segments (e.g., markdown text or code blocks).
    BlobPartPanel
    Renders a BlobPart into a JComponent, handling images, audio, and file information.
    CandidateSelectionPanel
    A specialized panel for displaying multiple response candidates side-by-side.
    CodeBlockSegmentRenderer
    Renders a code block segment into a syntax-highlighted JEditorPane or an RSyntaxTextArea as a fallback.
    GradientHeaderPanel
    A custom JPanel that renders a gradient background and holds a JLabel for the header text.
    GroundingMetadataPanel
    A specialized Swing panel for rendering GroundingMetadata in a rich, interactive format.
    HtmlRendererUtils
    Utility class for rendering Markdown to HTML and creating the corresponding Swing JEditorPane components.
    MarkupTextSegmentRenderer
    Renders a markdown text segment into a WrappingEditorPane.
    MediaRenderer
    A utility class for rendering media content (images, audio) in a consistent way across different UI components.
    ModelMessagePanel
    A concrete implementation of AbstractMessagePanel specifically for rendering AbstractModelMessage instances.
    OtherMessagePanel
    A specialized scroll pane for rendering any AbstractMessage.
    PruningToggleButton
    A three-state toggle button for managing the pruning state of an AbstractPart or AbstractMessage.
    TextPartPanel
    Renders a TextPart into a list of JComponents, handling markdown and code block rendering.
    TextSegmentDescriptor
    A record that describes a segment of text within a TextPartPanel.
    TextSegmentType
    Defines the type of a text segment within a TextPartRenderer.
    ToolCallPanel
    A specialized panel for rendering an AbstractToolCall and its associated AbstractToolResponse within a model message.
    ToolExecutionStatusRenderer
    A specialized renderer for ToolExecutionStatus enums in JComboBoxes.
    ToolPermissionRenderer
    A specialized renderer for ToolPermission enums in JComboBoxes.
    ToolResponseAttachmentsPanel
    A panel for rendering a list of ToolResponseAttachments.
    UserMessagePanel
    A concrete implementation of AbstractMessagePanel specifically for rendering UserMessage instances in the conversation history.
